LanguageData.SettingFlagInventoryWeaponsToolTip: If enabled, weapons dropped from non-player pawn inventories (e.g. combat suppliers) will be marked as 'looted'.
LanguageData.SettingLootedSellMultFactorToolTip: When a weapon gets marked as 'looted', their sell price multiplier is multiplied by this value.\n\nRequires restart to take effect.
LanguageData.MendingRemoveLootedFlagToolTip: If a weapon gets mended at a mending station, its 'looted' tag will be removed in a similar fashion to deadman's apparel.
